text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Listen to yourself at 1:38:38 and on, talking about HCQ. Then read this: https://t.co/N8rjSOvQic

You & the “doctor” who prescribed HCQ to you are both dangerous because you are promoting therapies for COVID-19 for which there is insufficient evidence to prove safety. STOP IT!!!
